# Link between PCA-regression, ridge regression and linear mixed models
***

This site contains background information on 

- Linear Models and Projections
- Linear Mixed Models (LMM)
- Ridge regression
- PCA regression 

needed to understand the BOLT-LMM and REGENIE method used in GWAS applications. 

Materials prepared for the journal clubs (09/04/2024 & 11/04/2024) of the Vaudel and Johansson groups
